1.text: Read the following word list and change the word by adding affixes. Add more words.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Read the following word list and change the word by adding affixes. Add more words.</prosody></speak>

2.text: cold, kind, beauty, wonder, ill, cheer, friend, thin
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>cold, kind, beauty, wonder, ill, cheer, friend, thin</prosody></speak>

5.text: Fill in the blanks with the words from the table above.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Fill in the blanks with the words from the table above.</prosody></speak>

6.text: Ruvini's brother, Nirmal enjoys photography as it's his favourite hobby. He likes to take beautiful photographs of people and objects whenever he is free. He has a ……………………collection of photographs at home. Last week, Nirmal went on a trip to Nuwara Eliya with his family. The weather was …………… than that of Colombo. There were different kinds of ……………………………. flowers there. While he was visiting a few famous places in Nuwara Eliya, he met Raj, one of his childhood friends. He is a very ………………….. and ………… boy. Nirmal met his friend after a long time and Raj looked ………………………… than earlier. He was visiting his uncle at the hospital. He was suffering from a terminal ……………. Raj invited Nirmal's family to visit him in Jaffna during their holiday. They thanked him for his …………………….. and said good bye.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='ruvini'>Ruvini</phoneme>'s brother, <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='nirmal'>Nirmal</phoneme> enjoys photography as it's his favourite hobby. He likes to take beautiful photographs of people and objects whenever he is free. He has a collection of photographs at home. Last week, <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='nirmal'>Nirmal</phoneme> went on a trip to Nuwara Eliya with his family. The weather was than that of Colombo. There were different kinds of flowers there. While he was visiting a few famous places in Nuwara Eliya, he met <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='raːdʒ'>Raj</phoneme>, one of his childhood friends. He is a very and boy. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='nirmal'>Nirmal</phoneme> met his friend after a long time and <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='raːdʒ'>Raj</phoneme> looked than earlier. He was visiting his uncle at the hospital. He was suffering from a terminal <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='raːdʒ'>Raj</phoneme> invited <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='nirmal'>Nirmal</phoneme>'s family to visit him in Jaffna during their holiday. They thanked him for his and said good bye.</prosody></speak>
